Title: Provides a tax exemption for real property owned by a person in active military service of the United States and their spouse
Summary: Provides a tax exemption for real property owned by a person in active military service of the United States and their spouse to the extent of fifteen percent of the assessed value of such property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing a tax exemption for real property owned by active military members
